patterns: Give me a list of symptoms for corona/covid
What are the symptoms of corona/covid?
responses: Symptoms of Corona Virus are fever, tiredness, and dry cough. Some patients may have aches and pains as well.

patterns: Are there any other symptoms of corona/covid?
responses: Other symptoms are nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat or diarrhea. These symptoms are usually mild and begin gradually.
